column2: QUEER PEOPLE ARE WHY I LOVE FILM
column5: These are the perfect queer films. An essentials list. Special shout out to the gay icon Babadook and homo-subtext films like Rebel Without a Cause. It's kind of the pocket edition of my Queer Films Everyone Must See.

column2: To Wong Foo, Thanks for Everything! Julie Newmar
The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert
